title: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with Flutter to showcase my projects, skills, and professional experience.
features: Fully responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Showcases a collection of my featured projects.
Built using modern Flutter widgets and practices.
Includes a contact form with email functionality.
Clean and organized codebase for easy maintenance and scalability.

title: Gold E-commerce App
description: A social networking platform to connect with friends, share updates, and discover new content.
features: Search and filter options for products.
Admin panel for product, order, slider,   and user management.
Real-time chat functionality with shop owners and customers.
RESTful API integration with a Laravel backend.

title: Baykinn (ဘေးကင်း)
description: A cross-platform mobile application dedicated to personal and family safety, providing instant SOS alerts and real-time location sharing.
features: Instant SOS Alerts with location sharing.
